segments.text: Would you go to the bookstore with me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It sounds a good idea . Let ’ s go .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you know Jeffery has published his second detective novel ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I heard about that . And I know you want to buy it , but I ’ m not interested in detective novels .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So what are you interested in ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Magazines about fashions , such as Cosmo Polian .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know that magazine . It ’ s very popular .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I can lend you some .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . But I ’ m not interested .
segments.speaker: S1
